welcome_home: Welcome to Aftrip, your one-stop destination for discovering and booking the best travel and craft experiences in Madagascar.
button_home_accommodation: Explore a wide selection of carefully chosen hotels to meet all your needs, from luxury stays to budget getaways. Book with confidence using an intuitive and secure reservation system.
button_home_handcraft: Dive into local craftsmanship by discovering unique and authentic products. Order exceptional pieces directly from the platform.
button_home_tour: Plan your adventures with our partner tour operators, experts in organizing memorable trips. Find and book your next experience with ease.
welcome_login: Welcome back! Please enter your details.
we_sent_a_verification_PIN: We sent a verification PIN code to
paste_the_PIN_Code_you: Paste the PIN code you received in the mail below.
no_worries_we_ll: No worries, we’ll send you reset instructions.
your_new_password_must: Your new password must be different from the previously used passwords.
must_uppercase: Must contain at least one uppercase character
must_lowercase: Must contain at least one lowercase character
must_number: Must contain at least one number
must_special: Must contain at least one special character
helping_you_find_the_best: Helping you to find the best comfortable place.
find_your_best_accommodation_on: Find your best accommodation on Aftrip
handcraft_header_title: Immerse yourself in a world where art and tradition meet on Aftrip.
explore_handcraft_categorie_label: Let yourself be seduced by the richness and diversity of the handicraft products that offer you, 100% made in Madagascar. Discover our different categories and find treasures that tell a story and add a touch of authenticity to your daily life.
dont_wait_until_tomorrow_handcraft: Don’t wait until tomorrow! Discover your adventure now and feel the sensation of closeness to nature around you here in Madagascar. To get the best adventure you just need to leave and go where you like.
home_made_customized_label: Discover some of the most unique and fulfilling experiences your next destination has to offer. Providing the best.

discover_and_enjoy_group_trip: Discover and enjoy a group trip.
join_on_group_expedition: Join us on a group expedition that promises unforgettable experiences, breathtaking landscapes, and camaraderie like never before. Whether you’re an avid explorer or a curious traveler, our expeditions are designed to ignite your sense of wonder and discovery.
